traits.label: name
traits.name: :name
traits.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

traits.label: min
traits.name: :min
traits.desc: Minimum value of the model; Set track's minimum value

traits.label: max
traits.name: :max
traits.desc: Maximum value of the model; Set track's maximum value

traits.label: inner-min
traits.name: :inner-min
traits.desc: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

traits.label: inner-max
traits.name: :inner-max
traits.desc: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

traits.label: step
traits.name: :step
traits.desc: Specify step amount between valid values (> 0.0); When step equals to 0 it defines infinite granularity

traits.label: snap
traits.name: :snap
traits.desc: Snap on valid values, rather than sliding freely; Suggestion: use with 'step' prop

traits.label: reverse
traits.name: :reverse
traits.desc: Work in reverse (changes direction)

traits.label: vertical
traits.name: :vertical
traits.desc: Display in vertical direction

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: track-color
traits.name: :track-color
traits.desc: Color name for the track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: track-img
traits.name: :track-img
traits.desc: Apply a pattern image on the track

traits.label: inner-track-color
traits.name: :inner-track-color
traits.desc: Color name for the inner track (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: inner-track-img
traits.name: :inner-track-img
traits.desc: Apply a pattern image on the inner track

traits.label: selection-color
traits.name: :selection-color
traits.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: selection-img
traits.name: :selection-img
traits.desc: Apply a pattern image on the selection bar

traits.label: label
traits.name: :label
traits.desc: Popup a label when user clicks/taps on the slider thumb and moves it

traits.label: label-color
traits.name: :label-color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: label-text-color
traits.name: :label-text-color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: switch-label-side
traits.name: :switch-label-side
traits.desc: Switch the position of the label (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

traits.label: label-always
traits.name: :label-always
traits.desc: Always display the label

traits.label: markers
traits.name: :markers
traits.desc: Display markers on the track, one for each possible value for the model or using a custom step (when specifying a Number)

traits.label: marker-labels
traits.name: :marker-labels
traits.desc: Configure the marker labels (or show the default ones if 'true'); Array of definition Objects or Object with key-value where key is the model and the value is the marker label definition
examples: [ { value: 0, label: '0%' }, { value: 5, classes: 'my-class', style: { width: '24px' } } ]
val => ({ label: (10 * val) + '%', classes: 'my-class', style: { width: '24px' } })

traits.label: marker-labels-class
traits.name: :marker-labels-class
traits.desc: CSS class(es) to apply to the marker labels container

traits.label: switch-marker-labels-side
traits.name: :switch-marker-labels-side
traits.desc: Switch the position of the marker labels (top <-> bottom or left <-> right)

traits.label: track-size
traits.name: :track-size
traits.desc: Track size (including CSS unit)

traits.label: thumb-size
traits.name: :thumb-size
traits.desc: Thumb size (including CSS unit)

traits.label: thumb-color
traits.name: :thumb-color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: thumb-path
traits.name: :thumb-path
traits.desc: Set custom thumb svg path

traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: dense
traits.name: :dense
traits.desc: Dense mode; occupies less space

traits.label: disable
traits.name: :disable
traits.desc: Put component in disabled mode

traits.label: readonly
traits.name: :readonly
traits.desc: Put component in readonly mode

traits.label: tabindex
traits.name: :tabindex
traits.desc: Tabindex HTML attribute value

traits.label: model-value
traits.name: :model-value
traits.desc: Model of the component of type { min, max } (both values must be between global min/max); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

traits.label: drag-range
traits.name: :drag-range
traits.desc: User can drag range instead of just the two thumbs

traits.label: drag-only-range
traits.name: :drag-only-range
traits.desc: User can drag only the range instead and NOT the two thumbs

traits.label: left-label-color
traits.name: :left-label-color
traits.desc: Color name for left label background from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: left-label-text-color
traits.name: :left-label-text-color
traits.desc: Color name for left label text from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: right-label-color
traits.name: :right-label-color
traits.desc: Color name for right label background from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: right-label-text-color
traits.name: :right-label-text-color
traits.desc: Color name for right label text from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: left-label-value
traits.name: :left-label-value
traits.desc: Override default label for min value

traits.label: right-label-value
traits.name: :right-label-value
traits.desc: Override default label for max value

traits.label: left-thumb-color
traits.name: :left-thumb-color
traits.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for left thumb

traits.label: right-thumb-color
traits.name: :right-thumb-color
traits.desc: Color name (from the Quasar Color Palette) for right thumb
